[36m# Project information for documentation publishing[39m
[36mprojectName: doc-demo[39m
[36mprojectDesc: [39m
[36mprojectLogo: [39m
[36m[39m
[36m# =============================================================================[39m
[36m# Documentation Configuration[39m
[36m# =============================================================================[39m
[36m[39m
[36m# Purpose: What's the main outcome you want readers to achieve?[39m
[36m# Available options (uncomment and modify as needed):[39m
[36m#   getStarted       - Get started quickly: Help new users go from zero to working in <30 minutes[39m
[36m#   completeTasks    - Complete specific tasks: Guide users through common workflows and use cases[39m
[36m#   findAnswers      - Find answers fast: Provide searchable reference for all features and APIs[39m
[36m#   understandSystem - Understand the system: Explain how it works, why design decisions were made[39m
[36m#   solveProblems    - Solve problems: Help users

troubleshoot and fix issues[39m
[36m#   mixedPurpose     - Mix of above: Comprehensive documentation covering multiple needs[39m
[36mdocumentPurpose:[39m
[36m  - getStarted[39m
[36m[39m
[36m# Target Audience: Who will be reading this most often?[39m
[36m# Available options (uncomment and modify as needed):[39m
[36m#   endUsers         - End users (non-technical): People who use the product but don't code[39m
[36m#   developers       - Developers integrating: Engineers adding this to their projects[39m
[36m#   devops           - DevOps/Infrastructure: Teams deploying, monitoring, maintaining systems[39m
[36m#   decisionMakers   - Technical decision makers: Architects, leads evaluating or planning implementation[39m
[36m#   supportTeams     - Support teams: People helping others use the product[39m
[36m#   mixedTechnical   - Mixed technical audience: Developers, DevOps, and technical users[39m
[36mtargetAudienceTypes:[39m
[36m  - endUsers[39m
[36m[39m
[36m# Reader

Knowledge Level: What do readers typically know when they arrive?[39m
[36m# Available options (uncomment and modify as needed):[39m
[36m#   completeBeginners    - Complete beginners: New to this domain/technology entirely[39m
[36m#   domainFamiliar       - Domain-familiar, tool-new: Know the problem space, new to this specific solution[39m
[36m#   experiencedUsers     - Experienced users: Regular users needing reference/advanced topics[39m
[36m#   emergencyTroubleshooting - Emergency/troubleshooting: Something's broken, need to fix it quickly[39m
[36m#   exploringEvaluating  - Exploring/evaluating: Trying to understand if this fits their needs[39m
[36mreaderKnowledgeLevel: completeBeginners[39m
[36m[39m
[36m# Documentation Depth: How comprehensive should the documentation be?[39m
[36m# Available options (uncomment and modify as needed):[39m
[36m#   essentialOnly      - Essential only: Cover the 80% use cases, keep it concise[39m
[36m#   balancedCoverage   - Balanced covera

ge: Good depth with practical examples [RECOMMENDED][39m
[36m#   comprehensive      - Comprehensive: Cover all features, edge cases, and advanced scenarios[39m
[36m#   aiDecide           - Let AI decide: Analyze code complexity and suggest appropriate depth[39m
[36mdocumentationDepth: balancedCoverage[39m
[36m[39m
[36m# Custom Rules: Define specific documentation generation rules and requirements[39m
[36mrules: |[39m
[36m  [39m
[36m[39m
[36m# Target Audience: Describe your specific target audience and their characteristics[39m
[36mtargetAudience: |[39m
[36m  [39m
[36m[39m
[36m# Glossary: Define project-specific terms and definitions[39m
[36m# glossary: "@glossary.md"  # Path to markdown file containing glossary definitions[39m
[36m[39m
[36mlocale: en[39m
[36m# translateLanguages:  # List of languages to translate the documentation to[39m
[36m#   - zh  # Example: Chinese translation[39m
[36m#   - en  # Example: English translation[39m
[36mdocsDir: .ai

gne/doc-smith/docs  # Directory to save generated documentation[39m
[36msourcesPath:  # Source code paths to analyze[39m
[36m  - ./[39m
[36m[39m
